original_text: The church is like Christ's body and he is its head. Christ fills all things everywhere and he causes the church to become complete.
korean_text: 교회는 그의 몸이니 만물 안에서 만물을 충만하게 하시는 이의 충만함이니라

sentences.original_text: The church is like Christ's body

sentences.korean_translation: 그리스도는 모든 곳에서 모든 것을 채우십니다

sentences.original_text: and he causes the church to become complete
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그는 교회가 완전하게 되게 하십니다
